site.title: SCW2 Mods Showcase
site.description: Complete collection of mods for Strip Club Wars 2

mods.name: Varied Dialogues
mods.author: Slaver0
mods.description: Transforms repetitive sexual dialogues into a dynamic psychological system with 400+ variations.
mods.longDescription: Uses character likes (rough sex, domination, submission) to generate unique dialogues. Also adds random variations when no likes are relevant.

mods.name: King Tut
mods.author: KingTut
mods.description: Comprehensive gameplay enhancement adding direct interactions, AI routines, and powerful cheat tools
mods.longDescription: Adds multiple gameplay features including direct job offers, workout/swimming together interactions, AI workout routines, financial aid system, stable relations auto-management, and an extensive cheat module for simplified gameplay without breaking game balance.
features: Direct job offers to any character
Extensive cheat module with character and MC options

mods.name: Cheats
mods.author: Unknown
mods.description: Simple cheat mod with two essential actions: restore full stamina and clean the club instantly
mods.longDescription: Adds two cheat actions to simplify gameplay: one button to restore all stamina (endurance) to maximum, and another to instantly clean the entire club (sets maintenance to 0). Perfect for players who want to skip the grind and focus on other aspects of the game.
features: Restore full stamina with one click
